title: Bullets Don’t Tickle*
lyrics: ...the offer you give me was preposterous
Papi, this bird won't fly, you sold me an ostrich
I'm just another nigga tryna keep his money up
I'll wipe that smirk off your face, you think it's funny, huh?
I ain't playin' my nigga, go ahead and giggle
If you think you playin' with Elmo, hell no
